commit.message:
Next (#461)

* Added typescript (#420)

* typescript: added typescript support with hardhat
* scripts: added running scripts for hardhat
* plugins: added hardhat plugins
* typescript: typebindings for hardhat user config
* typescript: added hardhat config to babel ignore

* Hardhat refactor ðŸ‘· (#434)

* add hardhat-deploy scaffold

* deploy: create custom contract deployer

* ts: allowJs true

* hardhat web3

* use import instead of require

* start fixing unit tests

* fix test running

* fix controller unit tests

* governor unit tests

* faucet unit tests

* Hardhatify ManagerProxy unit tests

* hardhatify merklesnapshot unit itests

* hardhatify TicketBroker tests

* hardhatify Minter tests

* hardhatify RoundsManager tests

* hardhatify PollCreator tests

* hardhatify Poll tests

* hardhatify VariableSupplyToken tests

* hardhatify ServiceRegistry tests

* refactored transcoder tests

* refactored bond tests

* refactored unbond and rebond tests

* refactored rebondFromUnbonded, withdrawStake, withdrawFees

* refactored reward, updateTranscoderWithFees, slashTranscoder

* setCurrentRoundTotalActiveStake, transcoderStatus, isActiveTranscoder, delegatorStatus, isRegisteredTranscoder, isValidUnbondingLock, getTotalBonded

* claimEarnings, claimSnapshotEarnings, pendingStake, pendingFees

* fixed event parameter

* changed accounts to signature and fixed a failing test

* bump hardhat version and add networks to config

* save proxies to deployments similar to hardhat-deploy

* hardhatify BroadcasterWithdrawalFlow integration test

* hardhatify Delegation integration test

* add genesis to deploy

* linter, solidity prettier

* husky pre-commits

* fix husky pre-commit hook

* remove prettier from pre-commit hook

* add solhint rules

* hardhatify remaining tests

* hardhatify solidity unit tests

* remove truffle migrations

* update CI to compile before running tests

* remove bn.js

* fix coverage command

* added deployment script for poll creator

* removed rpc class which used web3 to save checkpoints

* replaced web3 abiEncode with ethers pack

* Hardhat ABI Exporter plugin (#442)

* added hardhat-abi-exporter

* updated ci node version and removed truffle, ganache from dependencies

* updated node version to current lts

* fix linter for all .js and .ts files (#445)

* Code cleanup (#444)

* removed unused dependencies & scripts and updated readme

* restored docker integration test script and updated docker compose

* restored npm flag for passing arguments

Co-authored-by: kautuk kundan <kautukkundan@gmail.com>

* removed npm and added yarn (#456)

removed docker remote from ci and updated package json
fixed hardhat-deploy plugin issue
changed hardhat hardfork setting to berlin
updated node version requirement in readme.md
Move CI from Circle to Github actions
changed deploy command, fixed github actions build
removed coverall command from package.json

* Resolve merge conflicts in next (#462)

* added refunder test cases and some minor changes in other tests (#466)

* Added temporary fix for london hardfork compatibility (#457)

* added temporary fix for london hardfork compatibility

* edit yarn.lock

* fix hardhat-deploy-ethers not found issue

Co-authored-by: Kautuk Kundan <kautukkundan@gmail.com>

Co-authored-by: Kautuk Kundan <kautukkundan@gmail.com>
